'Iron(II) fumarate', also known as 'ferrous fumarate', is the iron(II) salt of
fumaric acid, occurring as a reddish-orange powder, used to supplement iron
intake. It has the chemical formula 4 24 . Pure
ferrous fumarate has an iron content of 32.87%, therefore one tablet of
300 mg iron fumarate will contain 98.6 mg of iron (548% Daily Value
based on 18mg RDI).
